Package com.isoterik.mgdx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameObject.__ComponentIterationListener
    An iteration listener that can be used to iterate the components of a GameObject.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Component
    A Component is a functional piece of a GameObject.
    GameCamera
    A GameCamera encapsulates a Camera object.
    GameObject
    A GameObject represents an entity in the game.
    Layer
    Layers are be used to group GameObjects of a Scene.
    MinGdx
    Environment class holding references to Application, Graphics, GameAssetsLoader, SceneManager and AudioManager instances.
    MinGdxGame
    Your starter class must extend this class to make it a minGDX game.
    Scene
    A Scene contains the GameObjects of your game.
    SceneManager
    A SceneManager manages the scenes in a game.
    Transform
    The Transform component determines the position, rotation, scale, size and origin of a GameObject.
    Version
    The current version of minGdx.
